com.punchline.javalib.entities.components.render

Class AnimatedSprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.punchline.javalib.entities.components.render.AnimatedSprite
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component, Renderable

    public class AnimatedSprite
extends java.lang.Object
implements Renderable
    A sprite that contains multiple Animations, each mapped to a String showing the state which that animation represents. (Jumping, running, etc.)
    Author:
    Nathaniel

    • Constructor Detail

      • AnimatedSprite

        public AnimatedSprite(java.lang.String[] keys,
              Animation[] animations,
              int frameWidth,
              int frameHeight,
              java.lang.String initialState)
        Constructs an AnimatedSprite.
        Parameters:
        keys - The animation keys.
        animations - The animation values. NOTE: This must have the same size as the keys array.
        frameWidth - The width of each frame.
        frameHeight - The height of each frame.
        initialState - The key of the AnimatedSprite's initial state.

    • Method Detail

      • setState

        public void setState(java.lang.String state,
            boolean keepStateTime)
              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Sets the current state key to the given key, as long as there is a corresponding animation.
        Parameters:
        state - The key to set.
        keepStateTime - Whether the state time should be reset to 0.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
